column1: '''''The 1990 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar''''' was the official Tolkien calendar published by [[Ballantine Books]] on [[24 August]] [[1989]]. It features art by [[Ted Nasmith]] based on ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.
